metadata.name: Sango's Enigma
metadata.description: Sango's Enigma portrays a young boy harnessing the power of thunder and fire in a quest to cleanse his nation from corruption, allowing its people to embrace a life of greatness. Inspired by the Yoruba mythological deity Sango, associated with justice, passion, and protection, this artwork invites viewers to explore their own interpretations. Through its captivating composition, it merges mythology with contemporary challenges, urging us to reflect on the transformative potential of art.
